product_desc:
Charmer is a fun and quick way for users to describe their friends and experiences.
Person - "Tall, Dark, Handsome"
Event - "Fun, Adventurous, Engaging"
Location - "Relaxing, Vintage, Trendy"

Mobile messaging is a 251 billion dollar business.
Online shopping services Trip Advisor - $12.6B Market Cap
Business ratings and reviews Yelp - 1.68B, Angie’s List - $423M

Started Building Product - October 3, 2015. 
Prototype - October 13, 2015
MVP - November 15, 2015 (Projected Date)

Less than one out of ten people leave reviews for items they purchase or services they receive. 
Product Comments/Reviews aren't scalable for large, enterprise companies and brands
Large competitors don't understand this and aren't doing anything to address problem

Looking to generate revenue with Business Partnerships & Advertising
Team - Ryan, Adam, Herry, Raman
high_concept: Charmer is a fun, easy mobile app to describe your friends and experiences in 3 words.
name: Charmer
